Entries.Fri_inlaw_Sebastian: I miss my {{SebastianName}}... {{SebastianGenderLC}} was always a little misunderstood, but I believed in {{SebastianPronounLC1}}.
Entries.Fri4: #$1 RobinSeb#I found an ashtray in {{SebastianName}}{{SebastianPossession}} room, and it smelled really weird. Should I be worried about this?#$e#Sometimes I worry about {{SebastianName}}... {{SebastianGenderLC}} doesn't have many friends and doesn't really seem to care about {{SebastianPronounLC2}} future very much...#$e#I would talk to {{SebastianPronounLC1}} about it but {{SebastianGenderLC}} never opens up to me.
Entries.Fri4_inlaw_Sebastian: {{SebastianName}} told me {{SebastianGenderLC}} is trying to quit smoking! I'm really proud of {{SebastianPronounLC1}}.
Entries.Sun: I hope {{DemetriusName}} doesn't blow the house up with those science experiments of {{DemetriusPronounLC3}}.#$e#I'm not even sure what {{DemetriusGenderLC}} is working on. I think it has something to do with plants.
Entries.fall_Mon: #$1 RobinMaru#{{MaruName}} likes gems. {{MaruGenderUC}} uses them in {{MaruPronounLC2}} inventions.#$e#So how are you and Maru getting along?
Entries.winter_Fri_inlaw_Sebastian: I think the farm life is really healthy for {{SebastianName}}.
Entries.Sun2: #$1 RobinDem#My {{DemetriusMarriedLC}} almost set the house on fire last night with {{DemetriusPronounLC2}} science experiment. One of {{DemetriusPronounLC2}} beakers exploded and sent a fireball into the rafters! Thank Yoba I used fire-resistant lacquer when I built the place.$u#$e#Sorry if it smells weird in here, @. It's my {{DemetriusMarriedLC}}'s bizarre science project...
Entries.summer_Fri: We're pretty isolated from the rest of the world here in Stardew Valley.#$e#It has its pros and cons.

Entries.Introduction: Hey, I'm {{SamName}}. Good to meet you.$h
Entries.Resort_Towel: %{{SamName}} is playing a jazzy tune on {{SamPronounLC2}} guitar.
Entries.Resort_Towel_2: Maybe I should learn to play the ukelele.#$e#{{AbigailName}} on the congas and {{SebastianName}} on the steel drums... 'The Pelicans of Paradise'...$s#$e#What's the matter, you look worried.$h
Entries.Mon8: I'll tell you a secret... my name '{{SamName}}' was not going to be my original name.$l#$e#Most people don't know that so keep it on mute.
Entries.Wed6: I've been friends with {{SebastianName}} for a while. {{SebastianGenderUC}} is a pretty cool {{SebastianGenderLC3}}.#$e#If you two weren't around I wouldn't really have any friends in town.
Entries.winter_7: One time, {{GusName}} fell in the river during the Ice Festival. We had to build a huge fire in the saloon to dry {{GusPronounLC1}} out.#$e#We were all worried we'd never taste {{GusPronounLC2}} famous spaghetti ever again.#$e#
Entries.Resort: I bet there's some cool stuff deeper on the island.#$e#{{WillyName}} said we have to stay here, though... some kind of liability issues or something.$s
Entries.Thu6_1: I think my {{KentParentUC}} might be coming back in a year or so.#$e#I guess you might be able to meet {{KentPronounLC1}}, then. If you're still living here.#$e#You wouldn't abandon the farm after putting so much effort into it!
Entries.Thu6_2: ...I have mixed feelings about my {{KentParentLC}} being back. {{KentGenderUC}} seems strange.$s#$b#But I guess I haven't seen {{KentPronounLC1}} in 3 years... so that could explain it.
Entries.Thu2: My {{KentParentUC}} is a soldier, fighting against the Gotoro Empire. That's why {{KentGenderLC}}'s not here...#$e#{{KentGenderUC}}'ll come back someday.#$e#...I've heard some terrible things about the Gotoro Empire...$s
Entries.Thu_2: Well, my {{KentParentUC}} is back. Have you met {{KentPronounLC1}}?#$b#I'm just glad {{KentGenderLC}}'s okay.
Entries.Thu2_2: Well, my {{KentParentUC}} is back. Have you met {{KentPronounLC1}}?#$b#I'm just glad {{KentGenderLC}}'s okay.
Entries.Fri4: {{KentParentUC}} used to work as a garbage {{KentGenderLC2}} in the city.#$e#You don't even want to know some of the things {{KentGenderLC}} found in people's trash.
Entries.Sat4: Oh! I just remembered I'm supposed to call my {{EvelynElder}}. Okay, I'm going to put this rubber band on my wrist so I don't forget.#$e#I have to make little reminders for myself or else I'll totally forget to do things.$h
Entries.Sun8: Sometimes I wonder if my {{JodiParentLC}} is actually happy with {{JodiPronounLC2}} life...$s#$e#I asked {{JodiPronounLC1}} once and got the feeling {{JodiGenderLC}} was hiding some inner pain.
Entries.spring_12: My little {{VincentSibling}} gets so excited for festivals. {{VincentGenderUC}}'s been talking about tomorrow's egg hunt all day.
Entries.fall_26: Tonight, after everyone is asleep, that weird old {{WizardGenderLC2}} who lives in the woods will set up the haunted maze. {{WizardGenderUC}} always makes sure no one is around to see {{WizardPronounLC1}} working.
Entries.summer_Mon6: Have you been to the desert yet?#$e#You can find some interesting things there. {{KentParentUC}} took me a couple times when I was younger.
Entries.summer_Thu: {{KentParentUC}} was telling me about our national enemy, the Gotoro Empire... They sound like a ruthless bunch.
Entries.summer_Thu6_1: Sometimes I can hear my {{KentParentUC}} pacing down the hallway at night.$s#$b#...But {{KentGenderLC}} won't tell us what's troubling {{KentPronounLC1}}.
Entries.fall_Wed: Hey... something smells good, like pizza.#$e#Do you smell that? Maybe {{JodiParentUC}}'s cooking something.
Entries.fall_Thu6_1: I think my {{KentParentUC}} might be coming back next year.#$e#I guess that's kind of soon. Weird.
Entries.fall_Thu6: I guess I should start thinking about moving out soon...$s#$e#...But I would miss {{JodiParentUC}}'s fish casserole, so I dunno...$s#$e#I hate making decisions.
Entries.winter_Thu6_1: I think my {{KentParentUC}} is coming back this spring.#$e#It's been 3 years since I've seen {{KentPronounLC1}}. This is going to be strange.
Entries.winter_Thu6: {{KentParentUC}}'s been back for a while now. I guess I'm finally getting used to it.
Entries.winter_Thu: My {{KentParentUC}} is in the military, fighting against the Gotoro Empire. That's why {{KentGenderLC}}'s not here.#$e#{{KentGenderUC}}'s coming back soon, though.
Entries.winter_Sun: Try not to make a mess in the house or my {{JodiParentUC}} will flip.

Entries.Sat: Hi!
